Question.Subject: How to get points on lockerz?
Question.Content:
On the faq on the site it said that there are 15+ ways to get points but i only know 4. .If you do the daily .when you sign in for the first time that day . if you watch videos . and if you refer people
does anyone know some other ways to get points on the site?
also don't say it's a scam cause it's not.
Question.ChosenAnswer: the 15 ways to get points is when the whole site is well better this year meanwhile just get the z- list and get points for now

Answer.Content: the 15 ways to get points is when the whole site is well better this year meanwhile just get the z- list and get points for now
